General.Name: Tianjin Xinmao Science and Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Tianjin Futong Information Science and Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of optical fiber preforms, optical fibers, and optical cables in China. The company primarily offers optical communication products, such as synthetic optical rods, plasma natural quartz optical rods, bushing tubes, single-mode communication optical fibers, communication ordinary optical cables, special optical cables, large-core micro-cables, photoelectric hybrid optical cables, butterfly cables, etc. It also provides quartz materials including natural high-purity quartz materials, synthetic high-purity quartz materials, quartz tubes, quartz rods, etc.; and quartz products, such as etching reaction tubes, cleaning tanks, quartz heating tubes, and ignition devices. The company was formerly known as Tianjin Futong Xinmao Science&Technology Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Tianjin Futong Information Science and Technology Co., Ltd. in January 2020. Tianjin Futong Information Science and Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Tianjin, China.
